content.author: vitalikbuterin
content.content:
Check out the deep funding round here!

cryptopond.xyz/modelfactory/…

summary: Vitalik Buterin, the co-founder of Ethereum, shared a tweet about a "deep funding round" related to a project on the platform cryptopond.xyz. The tweet includes a link to the project's page, suggesting that it might be of interest to those following developments in the crypto and blockchain space. The tweet was posted on February 28, 2023.
